DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy male female volunteer 18 70 year old . Ability understand sign inform consent document . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Known pregnancy . Chronic medical illness , wellcontrolled hypertension hyperlipidemia . Chronic use medication , exception oral contraceptive , hormone replacement therapy , antihypertensives antilipemics . Have problem dry mouth and/or dry eye . NIH employee subordinates/relatives/coworkers investigator .
